website_summaries.verdict: These trail-blazing heel wheels are exceptionally sturdy and fully adjustable, providing fun for thrill seekers of all ages.
pros: Adjusts to fit just about any shoe size
Easy to strap on and take off
Detachable spark pads are a novel touch that most kids love
Maximum weight capacity of 176 pounds easily accommodates older siblings and the young at heart
cons: Spark pads don't last very long, but can be replaced

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heel wheels for the price. Best part, it grows with you and its sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply awesome heel wheels. They came with two set of spark pads and one set of break pads. Wheels are not too fast and neither too slow. My kids use these in malls and they glide for about 10 feet with every push. Best part is that they will grow with you...i.e. these are not shoes which won't fit the growing kids next year :) Be sure to look at the unboxing and demonstration video on youtube. Just search for "Razor Jett Heel Wheels - Unboxing and Demo by 1DoctorGenius!!"
customer_reviews.author: 1DoctorGenius

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: OK....be warned that these are incredibly difficult to use IF you don't take the time to prepare yourself and train yourself by watching YouTube videos.I bought this for my tom'boyish niece (who jump ropes while on a pogo-stick) and we haven't mastered it yet, however, we did pull many back muscles while flailing about. My 44 year old sister attempted to do this too.Although she provided hours of laughter and stomach pains, it was a failed attempt.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiLee

customer_reviews.title: But on the positive side - it's surprisingly sturdy, I was pretty skeptical that it would hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Bought it for my 8 y/o, but could wear it myself. The learning curve is longer than I thought it would be - closer to real rollers, take a few days (rather than a few minutes) to get used to. But on the positive side - it's surprisingly sturdy, I was pretty skeptical that it would hold in place with just one simple strap going over the foot, but nope - holds real tight and definitely delivers on the promise of "growing with the kid" - no matter what shoes he/she wears.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Fun alternative to roller skating
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH FUN. Purchased for a production of The Little Mermaid to give that flowing, underwater look. They work best on smooth flooring like a cafeteria or gym, although the spark attachments are best used on concrete. You will lose momentum very rapidly on harder outdoor surfaces. Very minimal learning curve with these guys, also, so although it's pretty scary to start off, you'll be zipping around like a pro in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Ogawa

customer_reviews.title: Better than heelys
customer_reviews.text: I had bought my son a pair of heelys and for my 13 year old daughter my husband wanted to get these instead. Much better, they work just as well and cost much less. Also, they won't grow out of them like they will with heelys. I've used them myself, it takes a little bit to get the hang of it but not hard at all.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my boys for Christmas. They absolutely loved them! It took a while for them to get used to adjusting their weight on their heel. It's sturdy, and has lasted a full year with regular use and has minimal wear and tear. We never added the sparkers, just because my boys are too young and mainly use then inside. But the skate itself is great! I would purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE
customer_reviews.text: Received USED pair ! plastic box was opened and broken, black ties cut, wheels themselves scuffed and marred!!!!!!! Would not even give one star if didn’t have to. For a birthday party tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: A great Christmas gift for my 10y old daughter. We took it out for a test ride and within 1hr she was able to do it on her own. Very smooth we didnt put the spark things on yet maybe in the future. When the weather warms up she'll practice more and maybe start doing tricks. You need a helmet and knee and arm/elbow pads to be safe. Also dont try to learn on a bumpy unsmooth surface. We go to our local skate park and even though its crowded my daughter finds a spot to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Tehmine Yalbuzdag

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Wish I listened to some of the unfavorable reviews I saw on here before ordering. They do not fit as advertised. No matter what we did we couldn’t get them on my son’s feet even though he was within the size range. Then I forgot to request a return for a while and they said no because I waited more than 30 days. Trying to give them away to friends because we are moving and no one even wants them. Grrrrr...
customer_reviews.author: L. Syvertsen

customer_reviews.title: takes a little practice to learn but totally doable
customer_reviews.text: Fit is adjustable by sliding the base in or out (click locks). There are sparker pads on the base for those that want to shower the sidewalk in sparks. Refills available to order. Just don't spark near dry grass, etc.! Spark pads are removable and plain inserts provided. Seems a little hard to get used to rolling on just your heel, but taking a little time resulted in my kid mastering it and doing a few trick moves.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 year old. They are as expected, great for a smooth flat surface, not great for a sidewalk with any divides or cracks. They get stopped by every separation between sidewalk squares. The only place my son can use them is on the basketball court at the park. I think he wore them 4 or 5 times then gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to learn. Good quality. But safety gear also.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old boy that is normally very active and coordinated. He plays soccer and basketball. He is athletic. He also skates a lot on regular skates and in-line skates. He had a very hard time with these. I don’t know why. He was very discouraged as he really wanted to go go go. It took a lot of practice and falls. Definitely buy a helmet and body armour guards for your kid if you get these.
customer_reviews.author: Chad in Central Missouri

customer_reviews.title: How in the world
customer_reviews.text: Unable to figure out how to go forward without falling and breaking ankles. A big nope.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F1969

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing for my children
customer_reviews.text: buyer beware. these are amazing for my children, girls ages 8 and 10. my 12 year old son can also do it ok. My 6 year old is not bad either. however NOT good for an out of shape 32 yr old mom. nearly killed myself trying... they seem to be more popular for girls. all of my daughters friends got thm.
customer_reviews.author: Valued customer Leahs

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: This may work for anyone else but for me it was very awkward because it does require a little hyperextension and 1 year after ACL surgery it's not easy 2 roll on two wheels
customer_reviews.author: 5'7" 170lbs

customer_reviews.title: Kids were happily surprised and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got two sets for two daughters 10 & 13 They didn’t expect them and they both loved them. One is very athletic and one is less athletic but they both got the hang of them and I want a pair. Doesn’t fit well on mans size 10 sneaker. Doesn’t feel sturdy under 173 lbs. darn it.
customer_reviews.author: AmaExplorer Vic1768

customer_reviews.title: They fit onto every shoe and are easy to take on and off
customer_reviews.text: Mu daughter hasnt taken these off since they arrived. They fit onto every shoe and are easy to take on and off. Her favorite feature is the sparks which wows the neighborhood kids. She wears them everywhere and they are easy to walk in when rolling isn't allowed in stores. I see these getting worn out and another pair being bought in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: TBaril

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Permenant Options
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 8 yr old son. He picked up how to ride them in a couple of days, but not without some frustration & falling down. All things we expected as part of the learning curve. The sparkers are an adventurous addition. The fit is adjustable. They expand in the width & the velcro strap pulls the tight. They fit our 8 yr old but also our 11 yr old who wears a size men's 6.
customer_reviews.author: J & D Giff

customer_reviews.title: These are the best skates! Ordered them for our girls and a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best skates! Ordered them for our girls and a beach vacation, and we had to fight to get them off. Wore them up and down the boardwalk, into restaurants and stores, and even the airport. Great gift for probably ages 8 and up. It does take a couple hours to get good at it, but then they will take off for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is very happy with these. Haven't tried the spark attachments yet. Wish the straps were a little longer, though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L.

customer_reviews.title: Was this "hassle free" then boxed back up??
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are everything.. Packaging is a mess. Someone obviously opened then taped it back up.. Product looks unused (wheels have no marks) but has dust all over THE INSIDE so it's definitely been out of the box. I guess I bought it "brand new" and filthy.. I'm not impressed. It's a gift for my step-son who is very aware of quality.. I hope it passes...
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: ... minutes of hanging on to me before he felt comfortable trying them unassisted
customer_reviews.text: Took my 9 years about 30 minutes of hanging on to me before he felt comfortable trying them unassisted. He got a little frustrated, but kept practicing and finally got the hang of them. Taking them on and off his tennis shoes when he wanted to come in and out of house was a pain but then we decided to put them on some older shoes he doesn't wear often so he could leave the skates on the shoes permanently. That works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: An active fun gift
customer_reviews.text: We have owned these skates for one year now. The sparks piece only lasted a few weeks at the most, but we didn’t replace them. I purchased these for three children, ages 7, 9, 11. All three children were able to learn to ride quickly. They love them and we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: In my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Really fun for a young boy - 10ish - they come with little inserts that can make sparks. those use up pretty quickly but my son loved them. They can be bought separately but aren't super cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lael Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: If he rolls through this house one more time......I'm going to scream
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My son has been asking for wheely shoes and I have refused because, no. But these he can use in the driveway or over my loud protests, in my house without wasting a my money on a pair of hideous shoes I'd never let him leave the house in.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, but a bit bulky
customer_reviews.text: It is nice that these wheels can be transferred from one pair of shoes to another, but this comes with a price: they are bulky and make shoes heavy. Probably, buying Heelys instead is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Sent back. Grand daughter said they did not work as good as the other brand she has used
customer_reviews.author: Patti Gooch

customer_reviews.title: My sons love these
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 15 year old son. He wears them to the store when we go shopping and skates around pushing his toddler brother in the cart to keep him entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: it is really fun to use although I do recommend using protective gear ...
customer_reviews.text: You need some practice in order to get the hang of it, it requires an enormous amount of equilibrium not to fall. One of the wheels randomly gets stuck for a few seconds and sometimes at greater velocities it tends to twitch and jerks from side to side making it hard to maneuver. Despite that, it is really fun to use although I do recommend using protective gear since I feel on my knee and now I am in bed unable to walk fast or too much. Learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Teenage daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: 14 year old daughter loves these! She's great on a skateboard and skates but never tried anything like this before. Didn't take much practice before she was outside cruising. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: igot378

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I bought it for my 9 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought it for my 9 year old, he is still trying to learn how to use it. I kind of got the hang of it but I think is hard, maybe because I know how to roller blade and with this wheels you have to do the opposite moves to stop and go. One bad thing is that the breaks come off to easily while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Lilian B.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old is still getting used to these (can't quite get the hang of it yet), but I tried them and I was zipping around in 5 minutes. Thinking of getting a pair just for me! Well made, sturdy, easy to take on and off, and I love that these are adjustable so he can still use them as his feet grow!
customer_reviews.author: KellBell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these! He had an issue with one of the spark things falling off, but its really not that important after the first day of intrigue. He wears them everywhere. And my favorite part is that he can wear them with any shoes and take them off at any time too. They look like good quality. They dont look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: angelclark

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but hard to learn
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but it's hard to learn and gets quickly scratched. Also it didn't work very well for me but I was over the weight limit. I worked well for my friends though. I'd say a good product. By the way if you're over 175 pounds, this may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Just Looking Around!

customer_reviews.title: Make sure kids practice with these thoroughly inside before they ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure kids practice with these thoroughly inside before they go out. It takes practice. I will update this review in a couple months. We just got them. I tried them. I can manage but my 10 year old needs lots of practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for kids, wheels are a bit tight. These don't open wide for teenagers feet to fit very well though. Bought for Christmas, still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Kobold

customer_reviews.title: Tricky but fun
customer_reviews.text: Durability and construction exceeded my expectation. And my 15-year-old, 6'1" nephew was coordinated enough to get the hang of these within 15 minutes and start dare-deviling it. Only coordinated teens should use these - takes much more coordination than skates or a skateboard. For him, this was the best gift he got and for me, at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: CindyZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Never met a child that didn’t want to pair of these. Takes no time to learn how to use. At night they produce cool sparks when striking the payment.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful. My son 8 (turned 9 a week after ...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. My son 8 (turned 9 a week after getting them for Christmas) loves them. He wears them everywhere, in the house, and outside. They don't mark up the floor at all. Very easy to walk with them on when he needs. They are such a hit our 5 year old wants some for her brirthday, and our 13 year old bought some with her christmas money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this at all. Feels dangerous to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them, totally adjustable to any dhoe size!
customer_reviews.text: The sparks aren't necessary but totally cool on these comfort wheelie-Heelies
customer_reviews.author: Brandee E. Lacava

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a helmet, knee pads and elbow pads.
customer_reviews.text: My son fell really hard and even after trying so many times he still can’t figure out! Even watching videos
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Desir

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Too slick and dangerous. Might work for some, but I wouldn't consider them safe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tarantini

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Difficult for my 9yo (and myself) to use. Not for beginners but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Lauren DeAlto

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty neat. Put on back of heels and can ...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty neat. Put on back of heels and can use to roll around, kind of like Heeleys, except these you can take off. Heeley's are annoying to walk in afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Blissful

customer_reviews.title: The only bad part is that there were small pieces on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wears them every single day!! The only bad part is that there were small pieces on the back that kept falling off
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: They were all super excited but like with all toys it's now March ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the kids for Christmas 2016. They were all super excited but like with all toys it's now March and they don't use them.
customer_reviews.author: MBarker

customer_reviews.title: Fun birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr girl old loves them. Good fit and range for shoe sizes. Up to the Razor quality. Sparks are cool, just remember to swap them out before bringing them in.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaStephen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slip on, kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these. Easily slip on any shoes and off they go. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie andrews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and my 11 year old never takes them off!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! My 11 year old skates around the whole house in them and has a blast!! Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: So far they have been great and encourages my teen daughter to get outside and play.
customer_reviews.author: RJH

customer_reviews.title: These are so awesome. I bought this for my six-year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome. I bought this for my six-year old grandson and he loves them. He is too young for these and they are not easy for him to use, so make sure you purchase these for someone older than six.
customer_reviews.author: PinkAnMaHa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wanting to get this kid acrive and off the video games he needs to get active
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: For older kids with established balance & control
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the ‘age 8+’. My son is 6 and is far from being able to actually use these. Balancing all of your weight on your heels? I think he’d do better with those healies for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Rice

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to learn
customer_reviews.text: Very Difficult to learn even though easy to put on! Not recommended for kids with no previous good skating experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty fashion

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: 8 & 12 ye old love these. Easy to Learn in a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissey Bruggeman

customer_reviews.title: Fun, once mastered
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 10 year old nephew and he's thanked me many times weeks and months after. He's a master at them now. I think that these heel wheels are something unique that he shares with neighborhood friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Took her a time or two to get the hang of it, and a few more times to have the confidence to use the spark attachment. Now she loves them and shoes them off to everyone! Way cheaper than Target too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these as a Christmas gift for two boys, ages 9 and 11. They learned how to use them on their hardwood floors in 5 minutes! These kids, though, are extremely coordinated and are completely comfortable on skateboards, skates, unicycles, you name it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Poling

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my nephews at Christmas. They really like them and are attached to their shoes 3 weeks after Christmas. They take a while to get the hang of (my nephews are athletically challenged) but the kids don't seem to be bothered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard for kids to wear and use
customer_reviews.text: Don’t work very well. Hard to attach to sneakers and hard to control the speed of the wheels without falling
customer_reviews.author: A. Hardisty

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: simple to get on and after getting used to how to work them they are tons of fun. these last much longer with the sizing being adjustable then the shoe ones.
customer_reviews.author: RpO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Great quality. Requires alot of balance i cant do it but my son is catching on. Fits great and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: LaReinaHermosa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for big kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12yo son and he loves them, wears them as often as he can get away with! The size is adjustable and they strap easily onto whatever shoes he wants to wear. The sparks are "super cool" and overall these are pretty fun. Gets him off the computer and out of the house! :)
customer_reviews.author: Chryssa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My middle schooler is really enjoying this product. Just as expected. Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LuisaV & AlbertoC

customer_reviews.title: We can't figure out the spark pads yet but I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to get used to how to use them but my 6 year old figured it out and LOVES using them everywhere. We can't figure out the spark pads yet but I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son and 9 year old daughter got the hang of these in the first few hours of practicing in the garage. They do need help getting them on and off, so we’ve dedicated a pair of old sneakers to just leave them attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color description not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for a boy advertised as purple and when arrived they were more of a pink color than purple I returned them and ordered green product was fine just the color was off or the first set
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: These are a Christmas gift for my grandson. I think he will be thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Would not get for kids under 11 or for kids that are scared of falling.
customer_reviews.text: Kids have been having a verry hard tim with this. I would not sugest it for kids under 11. Grate for the hypper kids that dont mind falling a lot trying to get use to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Layland

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Husband says a deductible guarantee, so far no problems. Started practicing inside on carpet befor moving outside.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to place on shoes. Still haven’t figured ...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to place on shoes. Still haven’t figured it out so that my daughter can use them safely. We will try again, i guess, in the spring. Otherwise, yet another item for the donations pile :(
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Langlas

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: You must make sure your kid is wearing a helmet it can cause major injuries if not.
customer_reviews.author: Kranz k.

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward. My kids could never get the hang of it. Well made quality parts.
customer_reviews.author: Denise S

customer_reviews.title: Seems like an accident waiting to happen 😑
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult for my 9 year old. Hoping he will grow into getting the hang of them, but the sparks work and the razor quality is always good. I'd recommend for an older child.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: I’ll say, they’re so much fun! Great little gift for kids at any age - even older kids if you know what I mean!!
customer_reviews.author: Gi Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandson.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my grandson and he was excited that he got them for Christmas. He is only 8 so he is still working at riding them.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Bush

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old saved up his money for these ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old saved up his money for these and loves them. He is very athletic, so he had the balance down after about an hour of trying to skate. They fit his shoes currently with a little room for growth.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun! Easy to put on, easy to ride and best part nearly impossible to outgrow! Easy to store as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 13 5E shoe. They fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 13 5E shoe. They fit my shoes even without the strap. The strap was way too short.
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: The best gift
customer_reviews.text: my kids love it they play with the Razor Jetts every day from the minute they come home from school till bed time
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time with intact packaging. Skates are exactly what my son wanted!
customer_reviews.author: TLopes

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed that the cheaper on wasn't available when I was ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece had a blast rolling around in these! Was disappointed that the cheaper on wasn't available when I was ready to purchase, but this worked well too.
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Virtually unusable and dangerous, do not buy these, there is nothin to prevent your child from flipping over backwards
customer_reviews.author: David Quammen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with my 12 year old son. Takes a little skill to learn to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for friends that come over to have skates too.
customer_reviews.author: ricky morris

customer_reviews.title: cool toy
customer_reviews.text: my. ot really likes them. was a bit hard for him to learn, but. iw he is good at it
customer_reviews.author: Michal Goldshmid

customer_reviews.title: They do not fit all shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 year old. He wears a men size 10. They did NOT fit on his Nikes. They probably fit better on a skater shoe not an athletic shoe. Luckily they fit my 8 year old so he can learn to use them.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He kept growing out of the heely shoes so these are perfect because they fit any shoes. A++
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to get the hang of but the ...
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get the hang of but the grandson isn't falling as much now. The elbow & knee pads helped.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several pair of these skates. Every recipient was ecstatic! They love them. I have never given a gift that was so loved.
customer_reviews.author: mysi

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter won't take them off:). She is having a blast. We have not used the spark yet so I don't know how well that part works.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: TOOK GRANDSON A MIN GET HANG OF IT BUT HE LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love these. They won't grow out of them as they fit different size shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Fab

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Resistant heel wheels and very easy to put them on
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Great skaters
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun my son never leave the house without it, the sparkles didn't last for long but were really fun
customer_reviews.author: MNMP

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes works well. Fit's my son perfectly but It's hard to learn my son fell off a few times. But all in all they are awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter wanted it, took a day to get used to riding it, she doesnt use it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Kid could not use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for a kid who has some aptitude at sports, but he could not use the Jetts. Product issue? Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The young kiddos who got them as Christmas gifts were worn out by the end of the day!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Foley

product_meta.title: Razor Jetts Heel Wheels
product_meta.description: Give your plain old sneakers a big boost by strapping on these Razor® Jetts™ adjustable skates! They provide ultra-cool sparking action, and the spark pads are a cinch to remove and replace. They also feature a heavy-duty polymer quick-click frame, while a hook-and-loop strap promises the perfect fit.
feature_bullets: Get your spark on with the high-flying jetts by Razor
Just step up, strap down and take off with these easily adjustable and always awesome heel wheels
Features easily removable and replaceable spark pads, proprietary 50 mm urethane wheels and heavy-duty "Quick click" frame with hook and loop strap
Fits all shoes sizes U.S. Youth 12 through adult 12
Recommended for ages 6 and up (8 and up with spark); supports riders up to 176 pounds
